text: The Regina Cougars are the athletic teams that represent the University of Regina in Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada. The Cougars compete in all sports except football; the university's football team is known as the Regina Rams. Recently a number of the Regina Cougar women's ice hockey team were featured in the filming of the Canadian comedy television series, Road Hockey Rumble.
